channel.title: Odd models found in ST:U Update
channel.description:
As another update passes we get some more models in the game that shouldn't be there. New models in the latest ST:U seem out of place but very familiar.
[img='https://67.media.tumblr.com/b74a6832ea895f5838f89202e5531dda/tumblr_o78oj4Y2pD1tmna1co1_1280.png',none,714][/img]
Look familiar? To me this looks like the lockers in the locker room from Half-Life: Blue Shift. That's right. BLUE SHIFT. Also these handrails look like they belong in this part of Blue Shift: [img='https://67.media.tumblr.com/0bbca6440ede4924883113f8f01048aa/tumblr_o78oj4Y2pD1tmna1co2_1280.png',none,661][/img] [img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/adc800a31e67f4217ef9bad705c94330/tumblr_o78owgPzpG1tmna1co1_540.jpg[/img]
I really have no idea what they would be doing in the main-game. I doubt we will see an a official Blue Shift remake by Crowbar Collective. Although this might be to do with [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/14680-Black-Mesa-Blueshift/']Black Mesa: Insecurity[/url]. Who knows?

item.title: Odd models found in ST:U Update
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Yep, that’s why mine’s blue. platform\resource\sourceschemebase.res.
“Panel.BgColor” I believe is the setting you wanna change.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd models found in ST:U Update

item.description:
Mentioning the model browser… Is there any easy way to replace the black background in it? It’s hard to see some models because of the black background.

(Using windows 10).

That is, unless someone has found a way to fix that issue…?

item.title: Odd models found in ST:U Update
item.dc:creator: omegalucas
item.description:
bkdale86:

Neither. We aren’t working on them. The marines are/were probably part of the planned MP stuff (since I’m not entirely sure what you are highlighting).

Crypt was probably being sarcastic.

item.title: Odd models found in ST:U Update
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Whoa! And that’s not all! Wanna know what I found? The best part!

1600×900

As you can see here, I found out that there are HECU models hidden in the game files. I think this may hint to the inclusion of an Opposing Force remake as well. Who knows?

Read full topic

item.title: Odd models found in ST:U Update

item.description:
As another update passes we get some more models in the game that shouldn’t be there. New models in the latest ST:U seem out of place but very familiar.

Look familiar? To me this looks like the lockers in the locker room from Half-Life: Blue Shift. That’s right. BLUE SHIFT.
Also these handrails look like they belong in this part of Blue Shift:

I really have no idea what they would be doing in the main-game. I doubt we will see an a official Blue Shift remake by Crowbar Collective.
Although this might be to do with Black Mesa: Insecurity. Who knows?
